title: Late in Space Podcast: Discussing Semiconductor Supply Chain and Monopolies with Alessio, Michael Hosewicz, and Dylan Patel
summary: Alessio, partner and CTO of Residence at Decibel Partners, hosts Michael Hosewicz, founder of Small AI, and Dylan Patel, author of SemiAnalysis blog, on the Late in Space podcast. They discuss the feasibility of building semiconductor capacity in the US, highlighting the fragmented nature of the semiconductor supply chain and the existence of numerous monopolies. Both the US and China have the capability to shut down each other's semiconductor supply chains.
